A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a fan who went into this movie without expectations except an immersion into the world of Star Wars\, I was not disappointed. I did not experience the so called “filler” material other reviewers are talking about. Rather\, I experienced “connector” material that both adds into and ties together the movie. It was a masterpiece of movie craftsmanship created by a true Star Wars fam who understands what has been left out of the previous movies that needed to be introduced. 5/5 will see again.
